PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Level 1: Freezing Pulse+Arcance Surge and Fire Trap after Hillock. NESSA. Check for MS Boots at TARKLEIGH.
Level 4: Pick up a Frost Bomb for single target deeps. NESSA.
Level 4-7 THE CLIMB AREA: DONT FORGET TO FARM GOAT DUDES FOR EZ OP QUICKSILVER FLASKS
Level 8: After Brutas get Added Lightning Damage (Link it to your Freezing Pulse set up) and flame dash. Also pick up a Minefield Support, Remote Mine Support, Shield Charge and Increased Critical Strikes for later. NESSA
Level 12: After Merveil use Fire Nova Mine+Minefield Support+Added Lightning Damage. NESSA.
Level 18: Pick up Faster Attacks and link it to Shield Charge, start using it whenever it doesnt feel aids. Also grab Controlled Destruction & Concentrated Effect for later. (YEENA
Level 24: Get Hatred. Also an Enfeeble for later. CLARISSA.
Level 28: Assasinate General Gravicius and get Glacial Cascade from CLARISSA. Link as (in order of importance) Glacial Cascade + Remote Mine + Minefield + Concentrated Effect + Controlled Destruction.
Level 31: DO SIOSA'S SHIT and get a Decoy Totem, Spell Totem, Fortify, Hypothermia and Cold Penetration. Link Spell Totem with Detonate Mines, detonate mines is drop only so you will have to be lucky or trade for it, get 2 ASAP you will need an extra one for later. Link Fortify in your shield charge set up. Use Decoy Totem for bosses when needed. SIOSA.
Level 31+: When you have enough crit (%30 chance ish) drop Controlled Destruction Support and link (in order of importance) Glacila Cascade + Remote Mine + Minefield + Concentrated Effect + Hypothermia + Increased Critical Strikes. If you want to use the Tremor Rod Unique Staff drop Remote Mine Support for Cold Penetraion Support.
If you're having mana troubles try get a Vaal Clarity set up (also a drop only gem) link it as Vaal Clarity + Increased Duration (Lvl31: LILLY ROTH) + Faster Casting (Lvl18: YEENA OR SIOSA).
Level 33 or as soon as you are able: Do Normal Labyrinth and get Bomb Specialist.
Level 34: Get whatever Golem you prefer from OYUN if you want one and can fit it. OYUN.
Level 34+: Act 6 LILLY ROTH: Get an Immortal Call & Cast when Damage Taken if you havent already got them, link as Cast when Damage Taken Support + Immortal Call + Detonate Mines + Enfeeble. Keep Cast when Damage Taken on Level 1 and Immortal Call on Level 3. LILLY ROTH.
Level 55: Do Cruel Labyrinth and get Demolitions Specialist. Level 68: Do Merciless Labyrinth and get Explosives Expert if in SC or Pyromaniac if in HC Level 75: Do Eternal Labyrinth and get Pyromaniac if in SC or Explosives expert if in HC
Level 75+: Have fun :)
Useful Uniques (not needed): Tabula Rasa, Simple Robe Tremor Rod, Unique Staff 2x The Long Winter, Unique Threshold Jewel Atziri's Promise, Unique Flask The Wise Oak, Unique Flask Essence Worm, Unset Ring
